amendment.description: Amendment gives the Department of Defense the authority to provide severely wounded or seriously ill service members who remain on active duty, with a broad range of rehabilitative equipment including recreational sports equipment that must be specially customized to meet the needs of the service member.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 110 printed in House Report 112-88 to give the Department of Defense the authority to provide severely wounded or seriously ill service members, who remain on active duty, with a broad range of rehabilitative equipment including recreational sports equipment that must be specially customized to meet the needs of the service member.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Inslee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
